item.title: Unmatched Speed
item.description: When I write code, it happens now and then that I forget some syntactic knowledge, and typically I will ask google (type the question in the chrome address bar) instead of looking up in documentation.

item.title: Drawing analogy
item.description: Drawing analogy is a powerful way to come up with new ideas and questions, because it exposes subtleties.

item.title: Disgusting Digital Entertainment
item.description: This is a writing practice, which I hope my roommates can someday find and read.
